H3844.def: = range of mountains; ◄ north of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; ► known for the {L:cedar<SDBH:אֶרֶז>} and other trees growing there

H5594.def: = action by which human perform the mourning ritual for someone who has died, or for another tragic event; this may include {L:wailing<SDBH:ילל>}, tearing one's clothes, putting on {L:sackcloth<SDBH:שַׂק>}, covering oneself with dust or ashes, {L:fasting<SDBH:צום>} or eating specific food, {L:cutting oneself<SDBH:גדד>}, {L:shaving one's head<SDBH:קרח>}, covering part of one's face, etc.; this usually takes place during a specific period of time and ends after the burial has taken place, but it may also be repeated in later days to commemorate a tragic event

H251.def: = son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not

H269.def: = daughter of one's father, whether from the same mother or not; ≈ sometimes associated with affection; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine

H6912.def: = to put the body of someone who died in a designated place, such as a hole in a rock or in the ground, or in a place which was constructed specifically for this purpose; ≈ associated with death, but also with honor and respect

H2543.def: = domestic animal belonging to the same family as the horse, but smaller and with longer ears; it can have variety of colors from dark brown, through light brown to gray and occasionally white; ◄ |iEquus Asinus africanus;|i* ► used to ride on, carry loads, or do other work; ≈ highly regarded; for male see {L:עַיִר<SDBH:עַיִר>}; female see {L:אָתֹון<SDBH:אָתֹון>}

H5498.def: = causative action by which humans or animals move relatively heavy objects by pulling them over the ground

H3389.def: = town, formerly referred to as {L:Salem<SDBH:שָׁלֵם>} and {L:Jebus<SDBH:יְבוּס>};◄ located on Mt. {L:Zion<SDBH:צִיֹּון>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► conquered by king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, who made it the capital of his kingdom

H5927.def: = process by which a substance or other object appears to move up by itself

H3844.def: = range of mountains; ◄ north of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; ► known for the {L:cedar<SDBH:אֶרֶז>} and other trees growing there

H1316.def: = region; ◄ north-east of the River {L:Jordan<SDBH:יַרְדֵּן>}, ► at one time ruled by king {L:Og<SDBH:עֹוג>}, later assigned to half of the tribe of {L:Manasseh<SDBH:מְנַשֶּׁה>}

H5682.def: = range of mountains; ◄ located in {L:Moab<SDBH:מֹואָב>} northeast of the {L:Dead Sea<SDBH:יָם־הַמֶּלַח>}

H157.def: = state in which humans or deities experience a feeling of affection for a person, an object, or a practice

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H7962.def: = state in which humans live without fear or concerns, which is either or not appropriate depending on the situation

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H1870.def: = an open space connecting different places, ► used for travelling and transportation; ≈ often extended to denote our life as a journey from birth to death, and the totality of our activities during our lives

H7307.def: = an invisible being that is in a direct relation to and under control of God and one of his manifestation, often described as a substance that can be poured out, ► through whom the universe is created and animated; it can manifest itself as an invisible force equipping humans with wisdom, skill, and strength for specific tasks; it can also manifest itself as a movement of air through the bodies of animate creatures (breath) or through nature (wind)

H7462.def: = action by which animals are feeding on grass and other edible materials in the field, ≈ often extended to denote the way a king cares for his subjects or the way God cares for his people

H157.def: = state in which humans or deities experience a feeling of affection for a person, an object, or a practice

H1980.def: = process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another

H227.def: = referent pointing to a specific point in time, either in the past or the future

H954.def: = state in which someone has forfeited the respect of the community, due to a situation that is not in accordance to someone's status

H3637.def: = state in which humans experience a feeling of shame, as a result of their own actions or because of what other have done

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H3844.def: = range of mountains; ◄ north of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; ► known for the {L:cedar<SDBH:אֶרֶז>} and other trees growing there

H7077.def: = causative action by which birds build a {L:nest<SDBH:קֵן>}; ◄ with the help of twigs, straw, grass and other materials, ► as a place where they can lay their eggs and shelter their young; ≈ associated with security

H730.def: = evergreen tree growing up to 40 m tall, with a trunk up to 2.5 m in diameter; as it grows older its branches spread out more and more horizontally; grows in elevated places; ◄ Cedrus libani; ► highly appreciated building material; also used in cleaning ritual; ≈ associated with beauty, quality, pride, and strength

H4100.def: = a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified

H584.def: = action by which humans or animals make a deep inarticulate sound ◄ caused by pain, grief, or severe suffering

H589.def: = referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

H5002.def: = action by which humans or deities make a prophetic statement; in the case of a deity this is usually done through the mouth of a prophet or seer

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H518.def: = marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

H3659.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Jehoiakim<SDBH:יְהֹויָקִים>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► king of Judah (597); taken captive to {L:Babylon<SDBH:בָּבֶל>} by {L:Nebuchadnezzar<SDBH:נְבוּכַדְנֶאצַּר>}

H3079.def: = man, also known as {L:Eliakim<SDBH:אֶלְיָקִים>}; ◄ son of {L:Josiah<SDBH:יֹאשִׁיָּהוּ>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► king of Judah (609-597), appointed by Pharaoh {L:Necoh<SDBH:נְכֹה>}, who changed his name from Eliakim to Jehoiakim

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H3063.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}, and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

H2368.def: = engraved object; ◄ made out of metal; ► used to make a mark denoting ownership, approval, or closure of something (normally done by pressing into clay or heated wax and usually attached to a document or letter); sometimes worn on a chain around the neck, or in the form of a ring on one's hand; ≈ regarded as valuable and associated with exclusivity

H3225.def: = the side of the human body which is to the south when facing the direction of the rising sun

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H3016.def: = state in which humans are in a state of fear in the face of imminent danger

H1245.def: = action by which deities, humans, or animals make an intensive effort to locate (other) humans, animals, objects, or activities, which often requires them to move from one location to another

H5315.def: = the part of the body connecting the head to the rest of the body and containing the passageways for blood, air, and food; ≈ associated with breathing, appetite, and life and often used metonymically to refer to the entire body and the personality inhabiting it

H5019.def: = man; ◄ son of Nabopolassar; ► king of {L:Babylon<SDBH:בָּבֶל>} from 605-562 B.C. who led the people of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>} into exile

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H894.def: = town; ◄ in {L:Mesopotamia<SDBH:שִׁנְעָר>}; ► founded by {L:Nimrod<SDBH:נִמְרֹד>}; location of "tower of Babel"; capital of {L:Chaldean<SDBH:כַּשְׂדִּים>} empire

H3778.def: exact meaning unknown; = class of persons skilled in magic and soothsaying; ◄ found in {L:Babylon<SDBH:בָּבֶל>}

H2904.def: = causative action by which humans throw an object in a certain direction, often with force

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H517.def: = direct female progenitor; ≈ associated with affection and loyalty; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H312.def: = pertaining to being different from other objects and events that are in the same range

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H4191.def: = process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression

H7725.def: = action by which humans face a direction different from the one they were facing before

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H5375.def: = process by which an object increases in height

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H5315.def: = the part of the body connecting the head to the rest of the body and containing the passageways for blood, air, and food; ≈ associated with breathing, appetite, and life and often used metonymically to refer to the entire body and the personality inhabiting it

H3659.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Jehoiakim<SDBH:יְהֹויָקִים>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► king of Judah (597); taken captive to {L:Babylon<SDBH:בָּבֶל>} by {L:Nebuchadnezzar<SDBH:נְבוּכַדְנֶאצַּר>}

H518.def: = marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

H959.def: = state in which someone considers someone or something else unworthy of attention or respect, and shows that by his/her actions

H6089.def: = action by which humans have to make a strong physical effort to complete a specific task, for one's own benefit or in service to another

H3627.def: = human-made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes

H369.def: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non-existant

H2656.def: = state in which humans and deities are emotionally attached to (other) humans

H4069.def: = a reference to the cause, reason or purpose of an event; normally used in  questions with the purpose of identifying that cause, reason, or purpose; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that these things cannot be identified

H2233.def: = a flowering plant’s unit of reproduction, capable of developing into another such plant, in some cases also used as food

H2904.def: = causative action by which humans throw an object in a certain direction, often with force

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H3045.def: = process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H3789.def: = action by which humans or deities mark letters, words or other symbols on a surface, such as clay, stone, skin, or papyrus, usually with a pointed stylus or reed

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H6185.def: = state in which humans, whether male or female, have no children

H6743.def: = action by which an outside force (perhaps divine) quickly comes over a person, gaining control over the person or causing some immediate outcome

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H2233.def: = a flowering plant’s unit of reproduction, capable of developing into another such plant, in some cases also used as food

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H3678.def: = large elaborate seat used by people in a position of authority or wealth

H4910.def: = state in which humans are similar in shape, behavior or experience to others

H3063.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}, and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
